attributes.action: Gvrnmnt give all over 18's £1000 per month during the Corona Virus -help Economy
attributes.additional_details:
I sincerely believe this will help the cycle of the economy and the needs of the individual/family especially Pensioners.
This way, everyone will benefit the hard times to follow.
attributes.background: To suggest to keep the economy going, I am suggesting that the Government gives everyone over 18 years old £1000 per month during the uncertainty of the Corona Virus. This will help not just the individual, but the country as a whole.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
